pathu ekama aadaraya ketharam aadaraya pathuwath ma gen ma pathu ekama aadaraya obayiketharam saduwath amathaka karannataamathaka nowunu aadaraya obayi pahanak lesin dalwi aa numbaa ada sadak wela aadare namin jiwithayata suwada aran aadaraye aratha aran paminiya numbaa mage punchi lokayata mada nopathu nosithu lesin sundarayi mage jiwithaya ada numbaa namin thanu lokaye saththamayi mage wasthuwe diwiya thurawa innam numbaa langa nomakena nomarena .........aadarayen nosithu lesin nopathu lesinnuo mage diwiyema himikara wuwa.........nopathu lesin nosithu lesinyuga diwiyata apa pa naguwa........athithaye pemwathun lesin apaek wi hun kalayak thibi atha........enamudu kalaye awamayen apaapagen samugena depasata wi atha.........yali oba ma ek wi jiwitha gamanenobidena bammak lesin badi........apema wu ape punchi lokayakasuwaya widi aadaren badi..........

danata kriyathmaka waෙmin pawathina maෙma wyapruthiya haraha kanthawan 12 daෙnaෙkuta pamana owunge wruththiya nipunatha ihala nanwaganima sandaha sahaya laba di atha. 2017 wasare sita aarambha karana lada warshika samasaෙnaෙhas kantha dinaya, maෙwara wada surakshitha idakadak sakasamin ekinaෙkata thama thamanta himi nidahase winoda wimata awasthawak salasamin samasaෙnaෙhas saha dwisaෙnaෙhas kanthawan 75kata adhika pirisakda prajawata sahagayogi kanthawanda athuluwa kanthawan sadaha pamanak wu priyasambhashanayak pawathwuni.

mehidi jana­tha­wage wishala waga­ki­mak thiye­nawa thamanta uchitha yayi hangena jana­dhi­pa­thi­wa­ra­yeku thora path kara­gaththa wagema, nawa raja­yak idi­ri­yedi bihi kara­ga­nnawa wagema, shakthi­math wipa­ksha­yak bihi kara gani­mata, rataka shakthi­math aarthi­ka­yak hada­ga­ni­mata gowi­yata saha­na­yak laba­ganna, rajaye sewa­ka­yata saha­na­yak laba­ga­nnata ee wagema rogi­yata nisi lesin beheth tika laba­ga­nnata raja­yak thibi­men pama­nakma kara­nnata baha.

baththuluoya handiya asaladi gilan riya loriyaka gate; riya sahayakath maruta: hediya saha riyaduru halawatha rohale puththalama - nalin hendurugoda puththalama rohale sita kolambaa richwe aarya lama rohalata rogi daruwaku ragena gos bharadi aapasu emin thibu gilan rathayak puththalama kolambaa pare baththuluoya 61 handiya aasannayedi pereda (18 da) aluyama lori rathayaka gatimen wu anathurin puththalama rohale lama wattuwe sewaya kala waidyawariya saha gilan rathaye sahayaka marumuwata path wi thibe.

ohuge parajaya thawath barapathala wannata thibuna.
ayata muththa yana nam thabana laddeya.muththa thomo wisipas pirunu kalhi maha prajapathi gothami bhikshuniya langa pawidiwa sikkhamanawakwa wasaya kalaya.

ada ejapaye pakshikayan asarana wela,me naduwata ena minissunta the koppayak aran denna kenek naha.mangala samarawira amathiwaraya naduwata awith wahanaye nagala maru wenawa.ee nisa ada ejapaye pakshikayanta wagakiyanna kenek naha.ada ejapaye hitapu maha lekam thissa aththanayaka mathithumath me naduwa balanna aawa.ethumath pahadiliwa prakasha kara madhyata me naduwa wisandaganna nayakayanta madihath wenna kiyala.ada naduwata hata ganak innawa,ko me minissunta rakawaranayak,boruwata janapriya wennath thamange nayakathwaya rakagannath karapu wada nisa ada ejapa pakshikaya billata dila”
